1.name: Narrator
1.text: We had arrived at Terra Manus a week ago. It stood as the center of the Terran Empire.

2.name: Narrator
2.text: Grand Star Igna took Kelan's place only weeks ago.

3.name: Narrator
3.text: She was ambitious and it was said she had been wanting to take Terra Manus

4.name: Narrator
4.text: since she was a child waiting for the throne.
